reference:
Klein and Moeschberger (1997) Survival Analysis Techniques for Censored
and truncated data, Springer.
National Longitudinal Survey of Youth Handbook The Ohio State University, 1995.
usage: This data frame contains the following columns:
title: data from Section 1.13
description:
Description
The pneumon data frame has 3470 rows and 15 columns.

parameters.nsibs: Number of siblings of the child
parameters.education: Education of the mother, years of school
parameters.sfmonth: Month the child on solid food
parameters.agepn: Age child in the hospital for pneumonia, months
parameters.alcohol: Alcohol use by mother during pregnancy (1=yes, 0=no)
parameters.smoke: Cigarette use by mother during pregnancy (1=yes, 0=no)
